short_summary: Request for Proposal (RFP), Snow Blowers Spare Parts, with 32 items listed.
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement: Snow Blowers Spare Parts

### Title

* **English Title:** Snow Blowers Spare Parts
* **French Title:** Pièces de rechange pour souffleuses à neige

### Tender Information

* **Reference Number:** cb-4482-72527987
* **Solicitation Number:** W8476-236696
* **Publication Date:** 2023-03-28
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-04-20 14:00:00

### Tender Details

The Department of National Defence has issued a request for proposal (RFP) for snow blowers spare parts. The tender includes the following items:

| Item # | Description | Quantity | Unit of Issue | Deliver To |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1    | Heater, vehicular, compartment | 4          | Each          | 25 CFSD Montreal, QC    |
| 2    | Heater, vehicular, compartment | 4          | Each          | 7 CFSD Edmonton, AB     |
| ...  | ...                        | ...        | ...           | ...                    |

Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must indicate the brand name and model, and/or part number and NSCM/CAGE they are offering.

### Tender Requirements

* Delivery shall be made to 25 CFSD Montreal, QC and 7 CFSD Edmonton, AB within 180 days after contract award.
* Bids must be submitted by email only to marie-claude.theoret@forces.gc.ca.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* Debriefings may be requested within 15 working days from receipt of the results of the bid solicitation process.

### Contracting Entity Information

* Contracting Entity Name: National Defence
* Contracting Entity Address: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2

### Contact Information

* Contact Person: Marie-Claude Theoret
* Email: marie-claude.theoret@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: (000) 000-0000

### Attachments

* Tender Document: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4482/w8476-236696---snow-blower-spare-parts---rfp_eng_.pdf](https://canadabu
